analysis.key_quote: Yet, this is not the way to better the federal government. What it will do is continue to sew division and partisanship in our nation, while grinding our federal government to a halt.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based system and expressing concerns about increased partisanship and politicization within the federal workforce, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
